channel.title: English180 Podcast
channel.description: Learn English while listening and talking along with English180.com's head-coach Andrés Moreno. You will learn important words and phrases that are relevant to everyone's everyday life. Improve your listening, pronunciation, and conversation skills in an entertaining way that will motivate you to keep learning. The English180 podcasts are part of an extensive and entirely FREE English-learning program that can be found at English180.com. Remember, practice makes perfect!

item.title: Giving Directions
item.description: Learn how to give directions with our Headcoach Andrés Moreno.

item.title: Opening a Bank Account
item.description: Headcoach Andrés Moreno walks you through the steps of opening a bank account in English.

item.title: Eating at Restaurants
item.description: Go over some of the key questions and sentences that may be useful when ordering at a restaurant. Practice and improve your English communication skills!

item.title: Talking on the Phone
item.description: Practice how to make polite phrases and questions that will help you get the information you need in a phone conversations. Let's practice your verbal skills!

item.title: Getting Around a New City
item.description: Practice useful questions you may need when traveling around new cities, that will help you make the most of your time and enjoy your visit.
